Wisdom: أَعِنْ تُعَنْ
enWisdom: Assist and you will be assisted

Wisdom: كَمَا تُعِينُ تُعَانُ
enWisdom: Just as you assist [others], you are assisted

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُنْجِدْ لَمْ يُنْجَدْ
enWisdom: One who does not help [others] is not helped

Wisdom: التَّعَاوُنُ عَلَى إِقَامَةِ الْحَقِّ أَمَانَةٌ وَدِيَانَةٌ
enWisdom: Assisting one another to establish the truth is [a sign of] trustworthiness and faith

Wisdom: اتَّقُوا دَعْوَةَ الْمَظْلُومِ فَإِنَّهُ يَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ حَقَّهُ وَاللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ أَكْرَمُ مِنْ أَنْ يُسْأَلَ حَقّاً إِلَّا أَجَابَ
enWisdom: Beware of the cry of the oppressed, for verily he asks Allah for his right, and Allah, the Glorified, is more bountiful than that He should be asked for a right except that He grants it

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الْعُدَدِ الِاسْتِظْهَارُ
enWisdom: The best equipage is precaution

Wisdom: ثَابِرُوا عَلَى صَلَاحِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
enWisdom: Devote yourself to [working for] the welfare of the believers and pious ones

Wisdom: خَيْرُ النَّاسِ مَنْ نَفَعَ النَّاسَ
enWisdom: The best person is one who benefits the people

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ أَحْظَى النَّاسِ مِنْكَ أَحْوَطَهُمْ عَلَى الضُّعَفَاءِ وَأَعْمَلَهُمْ بِالْحَقِّ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: مَنْ وَجَّهَ رَغْبَتَهُ إِلَيْكَ وَجَبَتْ مَعُونَتُهُ عَلَيْكَ
enWisdom: Whoever turns his request to you [and seeks his need from you], assisting him becomes incumbent upon you

Wisdom: مَنْ آمَنَ خَائِفاً مِنْ مَخُوفَةٍ آمَنَهُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ مِنْ عِقَابِهِ
enWisdom: One who protects a fearful person from what he fears, Allah, the Glorified, will protect him from His chastisement

Wisdom: نِعْمَ الْعَوْنُ الْمُظَاهَرَةُ
enWisdom: The best [form of] help is giving support

Wisdom: بِإِغَاثَةِ الْمَلْهُوفِ يَكُونُ لَكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ اللَّهِ حِصْنٌ
enWisdom: Through aiding the aggrieved, there is a protection for you from the chastisement of Allah

Wisdom: فِعْلُ الْمَعْرُوفِ وَإِغَاثَةُ الْمَلْهُوفِ وَإِقْرَاءُ الضُّيُوفِ آلَةُ السِّيَادَةِ
enWisdom: Righteous action, aiding the aggrieved and inviting guests [to one’s home] are instruments [and means] of eminence

Wisdom: مَنْ أَجَارَ الْمُسْتَغِيثَ أَجَارَهُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ مِنْ عَذَابِهِ
enWisdom: Whoever gives refuge to the one who seeks his help, Allah will grant him refuge from His punishment

Wisdom: مِنْ كَفَّارَاتِ الذُّنُوبِ الْعِظَامِ إِغَاثَةُ الْمَلْهُوفِ
enWisdom: From the expiations of great sins is aiding the aggrieved

Wisdom: مِنْ أَفْضَلِ الْمَعْرُوفِ إِغَاثَةُ الْمَلْهُوفِ
enWisdom: Coming to the aid of the aggrieved is one of the best benevolent acts

Wisdom: مِنَ السُّؤْدَدِ الصَّبْرُ لِاسْتِمَاعِ شَكْوَى الْمَلْهُوفِ
enWisdom: Listening to the complaint of the aggrieved is part of eminence

Wisdom: مَا حَصَلَ الْأَجْرُ بِمِثْلِ إِغَاثَةِ الْمَلْهُوفِ
enWisdom: Nothing beings reward like aiding the aggrieved

Wisdom: إِذَا رَأَيْتَ مَظْلُوماً فَأَعِنْهُ عَلَى الظَّالِمِ
enWisdom: When you see an oppressed person, then help him against the oppressor

Wisdom: لَا تُعِنْ قَوِيّاً عَلَى ضَعِيفٍ
enWisdom: Do not assist a strong person over a weak one

Wisdom: مَا أَقْرَبَ النُّصْرَةَ مِنَ الْمَظْلُومِ
enWisdom: How close is succour to the oppressed!
